price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߊ߬ߡߎߘߊ ߟߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߟߎ߯ߕߎ߫ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߣߌ߫ ߛߓߋ߬ߕߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ߞߏ ߟߎ߬ ߸ ߞߙߎߞߊ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߓߊ߬
arabic: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوۡمُ لُوطٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ لۡـَٔيۡكَةِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wathamūdu waqawmu lūṭin wa-aṣḥābu al'aykati ulāika al-aḥzābu
